disclaimer.beginning: Disclaimer: The following architectural design is provided for informational purposes only and should not be considered as professional advice. Please consult a licensed architect and adhere to local building codes and regulations.

rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows oriented to the east for natural light.
Modern dining space adjacent to the kitchen, optimized for social interactions.
Open-plan kitchen with Vastu-compliant placement near the east entrance.
Quiet study area adjacent to living room, benefiting from natural light.

openings.description: Front entrance with a covered porch facing the east for enhanced morning sunlight.
Secondary access to garden area ensuring ventilation and connectivity with outdoor space.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden.
Guest bedroom with large windows for natural light.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and ample ventilation.
Private bathroom attached to master bedroom, optimized for comfort.

openings.description: Additional windows for enhanced natural light and ventilation on the upper floor.
Window placements following Vastu principles to balance the western exposure.

rooms.description: Additional guest room with natural light from north-facing windows.
Storage and utility area designed for ease of access.

openings.description: Small windows to maintain natural light without compromising privacy.
